title: Canada Travel Guide in English with map
description:
Traveling to Canada? Discover everything that Canada has to offer with this free guide in English with maps and offline lists. The best restaurants, hotels, activities and monuments in Canada.

Canada has much to offer. Visiting its monuments, wandering its streets, meeting the people and learning their customs is a must. That's why you have this guide toCanada, created using photos and recommendations from real travelers. And remember that you can save your lists offline. Canada is waiting for you!

üåèFeaturesüåè: 

‚û¢ The best places in Canada recommended by real travelers like you, with tips on what to see, where to eat and where to stay.

‚û¢ In 'What to See', you'll find a selection of must-see sights that you can't miss in Canada.

‚û¢ In 'Activities', you'll find the best tours and excursions in Canada.

‚û¢ In 'Where to Eat!, discover the most highly-recommended restaurants in Canada.

‚û¢ In 'Where to Sleep', you'll find a selection of the best hotels in Canada for all budgets and all types of traveler.

‚û¢ Complete basic information on Canada.

‚û¢ Photographs shared by fellow travelers. 

‚û¢ Download your lists to view their recommendations and photos 100% offline. Save on roaming charges and download your guide to Canada before leaving the house.
